Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.presenter

Class RmiPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.presenter.Presenter
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.presenter.RmiPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirtualPresenter, java.rmi.Remote
    public class RmiPresenter
extends Presenter
    Rmi extension of the Presenter (it implements ita abstract methods): The presenter of the Model - Passive View - Presenter pattern. This class is responsible of furthering the correct requests by calling the correct methods of the model (through the GameHandler) and by preparing the proper JsonObjects for the View. Every method of this class not only performs the action but also sends the proper notification to the client.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void callRemoteMethod​(java.lang.String method, java.lang.String value)
      Uses the Skeleton to call the method "method" on the object exported by the client, with the parameter "value".
      void disconnectPresenter()
      Unexports the object exposed by the server to the client.

    • Method Detail

      • disconnectPresenter

        public void disconnectPresenter()
        Unexports the object exposed by the server to the client.

      • callRemoteMethod

        public void callRemoteMethod​(java.lang.String method,
                             java.lang.String value)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Uses the Skeleton to call the method "method" on the object exported by the client, with the parameter "value". Practical example: if method = "updateBoard", the method "updateBoard" will be called on the client's View, and the board of that client will be updated.
        Parameters:
        method - The name of the method that will be called on the View.
        value - The value that will be given as a parameter to "method" method.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - It is thrown as a response to this Exception: ReflectiveOperationException.
